articles.author: Ashima Grover
articles.title: 2024 Total Solar Eclipse: 10 interesting facts about the natural phenomenon - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The 2024 Total Solar Eclipse will cross North America on April 8.
articles.content: As North America prepares for its second total solar eclipse in seven years, on April 8, the Moon will cast a shadow over a portion of the Earth that will be shrouded in darkness. Mexico mainland wil… [+4528 chars]
